name: github-actions-cac-demo
description: GitHub Actions Configuration as Code Demo - Simple Web Application

scripts.build: echo "Building web application..." && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.build:netlify: npm run build && npm run build:static
scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist && cp -r public/* dist/ && echo 'Static build completed'
scripts.deploy:staging: echo "Deploying to staging environment..." && echo "✅ Staging deployment successful"
scripts.deploy:production: echo "Deploying to production environment..." && echo "✅ Production deployment successful"
scripts.deploy:netlify: echo "Deploying to Netlify..." && echo "✅ Netlify deployment successful"
scripts.security:scan: echo "Running security scan..." && npm audit --audit-level=moderate && echo "✅ Security scan completed"
scripts.performance:test: echo "Running performance tests..." && echo "✅ Performance tests completed"

author: Demo User
